meanings.definition: To scatter or sprinkle with something
meanings.sent1: She besprinkled the cupcakes with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: The gardener besprinkled water on the plants to help them grow.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous fairy besprinkled glitter all over the room.
meanings.sent4: The artist besprinkled paint on the canvas, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef besprinkled herbs on the dish, adding flavor.

meanings.definition: Covered or adorned with small drops or particles of something
meanings.sent1: The cake was besprinkled with tiny sugar crystals.
meanings.sent2: The field was besprinkled with dew in the early morning.
meanings.sent3: The besprinkled sidewalk sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her hair looked besprinkled with stars under the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The besprinkled dress shimmered as she twirled.
